title: Error: Unable to load trie node value
body:
Mainnet
v22.7.2
Checkpoint sync
Bonsai
Paired with Lighthouse

```
2022-09-10 07:28:42.488+02:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-0 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #15,507,058 / 177 tx / 0 om / 12,357,960 (41.2%) gas / (0xeb57cfb3a467b8d2fac4755ea307e0170cb9b7958c8e2e3867325a39d464aea3) in 0.810s. Peers: 37

Related to https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/issues/4079, but not the same as it's able to recover.

Also seen here.

v22.7.2
X_SNAP sync
Bonsai
No consensus engine connected.

as long as Besu keeps importing blocks it doesn't matter. we have implemented mechanisms to make bonsai more robust and the side effect is the display of this type of log. we are going to make this stacktrace less scary

```
